summary: A complete modification of the manor of Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/938/proudspiremanor.png[/img]


Complete modification of the Manor located in Solitude.

= CONTAINS =

- A new room with 6 weapons racks
- Redesign of the room on the ground floor and addition of 8 chests and 4 mannequins
- Dragon Priest Shrine (usable) on the second floor
- A complete set for the forge in a new room at the ground floor with 3 chests
- More elements for decorating the forge and the ground floor with 1 chests


Feel free to ask questions or suggest ideas to improve the manor and if you like this mod, endorse me!

[/center]
author: Lenox
